title: GET_GROUND_Z_AND_NORMAL_FOR_3D_COORD
content:
0x8BDC7BFC57A81E760x64D91CED// GetGroundZAndNormalFor_3dCoord
BOOL GET_GROUND_Z_AND_NORMAL_FOR_3D_COORD(float x, float y, float z, float* groundZ, Vector3* normal);Parameters:x: X-coordinate of the point to check.y: Y-coordinate of the point to check.z: Z-coordinate of the point to check.groundZ: A pointer to a float where the ground Z-coordinate will be stored if found.normal: A pointer to a Vector3 structure where the surface normal at the ground point will be stored.Returns: Returns true if ground is found below the given coordinates and the surface normal could be determined, otherwise false.Attempts to identify the highest ground Z-coordinate and determine the corresponding surface normal directly beneath a specified 3D coordinate.NativeDB Introduced: v323Old name:  _GET_GROUND_Z_COORD_WITH_OFFSETSExamples:LuaJavaScriptC#local x, y, z = 100.0, -200.0, 50.0
local success, groundZ, normal = GetGroundZAndNormalFor_3dCoord(x, y, z)

if success then
    print("Ground Z found at: ", groundZ)
    print("Surface normal is: ", normal.x, normal.y, normal.z)
else
    print("No ground found.")
end
codeBlocks:
